author: Staff Reporter
text:
M. Yathishkumar (30) of Pelthangarai in Karnataka, who is a manager in a private bank here, died after he is said to have accidentally fallen into a check dam at Aliyar.

The Aliyar police said that the victim and his friends were sitting on the wall of the check dam, when he accidentally fell into it and drowned on Saturday evening.

His body was recovered and sent to Pollachi government hospital for post-mortem examination.

Man falls off bus, dies

A 73-year-old man, who fell down from a private bus on NSR Road in Saibaba Colony on Friday, died at the Coimbatore Medical College Hospital on Saturday. The Traffic Investigation Wing (West), of the city police, said that the victim, C. Eswaran of R.S. Puram, fell down as the driver, S. Ramesh (27), drove the bus in a rash and negligent manner. The driver was booked under Sections 279 (rash driving) and 304(A) (causing death by negligence) of the Indian Penal Code, arrested and was granted bail.
title: Bank manager drowns at Aliyar
